name: Panel
text: A single-widget container with title bar and controls.

attrs.name: child
descs:
The child widget. If you need more children, use a layout widget,
e.g. HBox or VBox.

attrs.name: closable
descs:
Whether this panel is closeable or not. If True, an “x” button will
appear.

attrs.name: title
descs: An optional text title of the panel.

json:
{
  "child": null,
  "closable": false,
  "css_classes": null,
  "disabled": false,
  "height": null,
  "id": "747baf83-feea-4c82-927f-472085da7d9d",
  "js_callbacks": {},
  "name": null,
  "sizing_mode": "fixed",
  "tags": [],
  "title": "",
  "width": null
}

name: Tabs
text: A panel widget with navigation tabs.

attrs.name: active
descs: The index of the active tab.

attrs.name: callback
descs: A callback to run in the browser whenever the button is activated.

attrs.name: tabs
descs: The list of child panel widgets.

json:
{
  "active": 0,
  "callback": null,
  "css_classes": null,
  "disabled": false,
  "height": null,
  "id": "136de12f-5328-438a-b4b9-ece4073b34b9",
  "js_callbacks": {},
  "name": null,
  "sizing_mode": "fixed",
  "tabs": [],
  "tags": [],
  "width": null
}
